about_the_game:
Mysterious creatures have emerged from the realm only known as the Velvet.
With the ability to materialize projectiles from thin air, they are wrecking havoc on the mortal realm.
But hope is on the horizon; some of the creatures are fighting back against the others, pushing them into the Velvet again.
Nobody knows why they are fighting back, but they have been given the name "Velvet Guard".
Help the mortal realm fight back and possess the Velvet Guard!

Velvet Guard is an 8-player party game with intense and hilarious versus matches. The core mechanics are simple and accessible; you have a fixed amount of projectiles that, after being fired, can be picked up by anyone. With different game modes and options, each gameplay is never the same. With a wide array of abilities and expressive depth, the game can be quite challenging and fun.

Notable features:
  • Diverse abilities to change up your gameplay and challenge your skills
  • Fast paced combat
  • A wide range of levels with their own unique style and interactions
  • A level editor to upload custom levels to the workshop
